name: Poker Tally+ VPIP and RFI Tracker
description: Poker Tally+ is the app you need to track all your preflop stats when playing a live poker session. One tap interface lets you record your preflop action quickly so you can get back to observing your poker table in no time. The app gives you VPIP, PFR, 3-bet and other relevant frequencies so you know exactly how you playing in the current session. Position-wise breakdown lets you analyse your preflop stats by position.  Ever wondered how can you take online HUD to live realm? This is as close as it gets! Features of Poker Tally app includes:  - Track RFI, Limp, Flat Calling, 3-bet, Squeeze, Blind defense and more! - Analyse your current play by looking at the stats by position - RFI(Raise First In or Open Raise), aggregated by position helps you play with more positional awareness. - Easy One Tap interface. - Simple, Beautiful and more importantly, useful! - 100% satisfaction guaranteed!  We are adding more features to help improve your live poker play. If you have any questions, feedback and/or concerns, please contact us via in app. Dont miss out this great value, free app. Get it now!
